title: Lover Boy // Good Omens // Animatic
author: Eliot Lime
comment: you should totally read my description btw

Crowley, in tears: and then he said I go too fAsT fOr HiM?! HuH?!

Freddie Mercury, frantically writing down the lyrics for Good Old Fashioned Lover Boy: Darling I know, I know

I DIDNT REALIZE THE SONG ACTUALLY SAID DINING AT THE RITZ

I AM NOW A FIRM BELIEVER OF THE CROWLEY TALKING TO FREDDIE THEORY
just imagine crowley listening to this in his car and just screaming out the lyrics

Crowley:AND WE DINED AT THE RITZ, AND LIKE, I ASKED HIM INDIRECTALLY ON A DATE.
I'VE BEEN TRYING TO TALK TO HIM FOR YEARS! HE LITERALLY IS SO OBliVioUs!-

Freddie Mercury: RIGHT THAT DOWN RIGHT THAT DOWN
description:
This took a whole got damn month to finish and i honestly have no idea why i decided to do this, especially a week after reading the book + watching the show. 

ALSO HOT TIP! if you want to do an animatic/animation/a long term project with repeating characters, make sure you know how to draw the characters before hand because goddamn do they look ugly until the 40 second mark.

I honestly wasn't sure if i should keep posting this since so many others have used this song but here it is also i figured i should link some of the stuff so ya'll can check out their works too!

Original inspiration:
